Package mainCode

Class Area

java.lang.Object
mainCode.Area
Direct Known Subclasses:
EmptyArea, FightArea, GameArea, LockedArea, PuzzleArea
public abstract class Area
extends java.lang.Object
A superclass representing areas on the gameboard
